Egwuregwu

Ebe foto si, Patrick Okigbo III
Pius Okigbo
Pius Nwabufo Charles Okigbo bụ odogwu wetaara ndị Igbo nakwa Naịjirịa niile aha ọma n'oge gara aga.
Ọ bụrụ na Pius Okigbo ka nọ ndụ, taa bụ abalị isii nke ọnwa Febụrụwarị afọ 2021 ka ọ gaara agba afọ iri itoolu na asaa.
Mana ọ bụ eziokwu na odogwu a alaala mmụọ kamgbe afọ iri abụọ na otu gara aga, aha ya ka na-ada ụda n'ụwa niile.
Ebe foto si, Okigbo Family
A mụrụ Pius Okigbo n'afọ 1924
Ọ bụ onye Ojoto dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Idemmili South n'Anambra steeti
Ezinụlọ Okigbo bụ nnukwu ezinụlọ a ma ama n'Ojoto dịka ha nwere ọtụtụ nnukwu mmadụ a nụrụ aha ha na Naịjirịa dịka Chris Okigbo na Patrick Okigbo
Pius Okigbo gụrụ akwụkwọ Sekọndịrị n'ụlọakwụkwọ Christ the King College n'Ọnịcha,

O gosiri ihe o ji bụrụ ọkaibe oge o nwetara nzere 'bacherlors degree' na ngalaba 'Economics' nke 'London University', mana ọ jighị ụkwụ ya abụọ gaa ụlọwkaụkwọ ahụ, kama ọ nọ na Naịjirịa gụọ ya nke a kpọrọ 'correspondence' n'oge ahụ
N'eziokwu, nzere atọ ka Pius Okigbo nwetara n'ụzọ correspondece na 'London University' - B.A History, B.SC Economics, na LLB (nzere ọkaiwu)
Pius Okigbo bụ onye Naịjirịa mbụ nwetara ụdị nturu ugo a
O mechara nweta nzere 'Masters' nakwa 'Ph.D' na mahadum 'Northwestern University' nke mba Amerịka
Ọ bụ ya bụ onye Afrịka mbụ nwetara Ph.D na mahadum a.
Pius Okigbo dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ gbasara mmụta 'Economics', nke mbụ bụ nke ọ kpọrọ 'Nigeria Public Finance' n'afọ 1956
Ebe foto si, okigbo memorial secondary school Ojoto
Oge Biafra kewapụrụ na Naịjirịa, Pius Okigbo sonyeere Biafra
Ọ bụ ya bụ onye na-enyere Odumegwu Ojukwu aka ikpezi nghọtahie dapụtara n'etiti ndị isi n'otu ndị agha Biafra
Ka agha kwụsịrị n'afọ 1970, gọọmentị Naịjirịa tukpuru Pius Okigbo na mkpọrọ ruo otu afọ na ọkara
Na 1977 o nwetara nkwanye ugwu 'Commander of the Order of the Niger (CON)
Na 1983, e nyekwara ya nkwanye ugwu 'Nigeria National Order of Merit'
Pius Okigbo bụ onyeisi kọmiti Onyeisiala Sani Abacha hibere ka ha hzigharịa ụlọakụ etiti (Central Bank) n'afọ 1994.
Ruo taa, ihe a na-akpọ mpụtara nnyocha kọmiti a mere bụ 'Okigbo Report'
Okigbo nwụrụ n'ọnwa Sepụtemba afọ 2000
